toc_entry.title: The Big Picture
toc_entry.description: A legacy of the Great Depression, murals in Texas post offices inspire reflection on the state’s splendid history and its grand potential.

toc_entry.title: Parish the Thought!
toc_entry.description: Fyi: The Houston Post's new society sleuth has great connections, a phone in her purse, and the complete attention of Houston’s haut monde.

toc_entry.title: The Sundown Kids
toc_entry.description: Once upon a summer, children whiled away their twilight time with outdoor games like Piggy Wants a Whistle, Witch o’ Witch, and Fox across the River.

toc_entry.title: The Texas 100
toc_entry.description: Wealthy Texans have been heard to say that money is just a way of keeping score. Here’s the scoreboard.

toc_entry.title: Introduction
toc_entry.description: How we calculated the fortunes of the richest Texans.

toc_entry.title: Minor Details
toc_entry.description: Are Longhorns richer than aggies? Is Dallas richer than Houston? Is it easier to get rich selling food or cars? For the answers, check out the statistical breakdown of the Texas 100.

toc_entry.title: Close, But No Cigar
toc_entry.description: Why T. Boone Pickens, Bill Clements, Lady Bird, and other runners-up didn’t make the list.

toc_entry.title: Index
toc_entry.description: H. Ross Perot comes first; here’s where to find the other 99.

toc_entry.title: The Roar Of the Crowd
toc_entry.description: Following spirit religions; making tough thrift decisions; teaching tools for life.

toc_entry.title: Around the State
toc_entry.description: A selective guide to amusements and events.

toc_entry.title: Reporter
toc_entry.description: The Starck Club, R.I.P.; batmania bewitches austin; a country composer goes cosmic; Houston art gets a comic review.

toc_entry.title: State Secrets
toc_entry.description: Previewing the legislative battle over abortion; who popped the Houston Pops’ balloon; Republicans got Jim Wright and may get his old House seat too.
